description: Says Army Is Ready For Any Kind Of Situation

title: Donna Kelce faces backlash over controversial casting on The Traitors US
description: Donna Kelce faced online backlash after her casting on The Traitors US, with fans accusing producers of setting her up to fail. Viewers criticized her Secret Traitor role, arguing she lacked reality TV experience. While some defended her reserved approach, many felt the casting choice was unfair and driven more by publicity than gameplay.

description: In Sundays summit clash, Vidarbha will play the winner of the Punjab-Saurashtra semifinal

title: Amid ink row, Mumbai sees high voting; exit polls give BMC win to BJP+
description: The BMC elections in Mumbai, held after a gap of nine years, attracted a commendable voter turnout of about 54-56%. Early exit polls hint at a likely triumph for the BJP-Shiv Sena alliance, which could signal the end of the Thackeray family's 30-year dominance.

title: Can datacentres in orbit solve for AI models soaring energy demand?
description: Googles Project Suncatcher is experimenting with a novel approach: putting datacentres servicing AI workloads in low-earth orbit and letting them feed on solar energy; ISRO is also reportedly studying space-based datacentre technology

title: Yemen PM Salem bin Breik resigns; Shaya Mohsen Zindani named as replacement
'Dump' yard? Bird poop halts play in India Open; TV cameras ignore break
description: In an unexpected turn of events, the India Open badminton tournament faced interruptions not from the players, but from nature itself, as bird droppings halted a tense showdown between H S Prannoy and Loh Kean Yew. While commentators initially downplayed the situation, the competitors confirmed that the feathery interlopers were indeed the culprits.

title: 'Expected better human': Cricketer lashes out at Mary Kom; later deletes video
description: Cricketer Manoj Tiwary expressed deep hurt over Mary Kom's public statements about her ex-husband, Karung Onkholer Kom, highlighting the crucial role of a support system for athletes. Tiwari emphasized the importance of mutual contribution in relationships and voiced concern for Onkholer's mental well-being following the public dispute over alleged financial misconduct.

title: 'We ask for forgiveness': Ex-Pakistan players left embarrassed byFarhan's choice - Watch
description: Pakistan batter Sahibzada Farhan sparked online ridicule by choosing Ahmed Shehzad over cricketing legends like Sachin Tendulkar and Virender Sehwag in a questionnaire. Farhan cited Shehzad as an inspiration for his own cricket journey. Former Pakistan cricketers Basit Ali and Kamran Akmal expressed disbelief and apologized for Farhan's controversial selection.

title: Drones sighted along India-Pakistan border in J&Ks Poonch, Samba
description: The drones were seen hovering along the Line of Control (LoC) in Poonch and the Ramgarh sector of Samba district

title: Top LeT commander admits Operation Sindoor razed their HQ in Muridke
Devotees break gate obstructing Devra Yatra in Uttarakhands Rudraprayag; case filed against 52
description: The large number of devotees present allegedly created a chaotic situation, resulting in the national highway being blocked for several hours.

title: ED moves SC to implead MHA, DoPT as agency verifies role of Bengal chief secretary
Explosion causes large fire in Dutch town of Utrecht, four injured
description: Local authorities said there was extensive damage in this densely populated area of the town

title: ED charge of interference serious, says SC on face-off with Mamata
Travis Kelce, Taylor Swift relationship strained over his life after football
description: Taylor Swift is reportedly concerned about Travis Kelces emotional well-being as he considers retirement from the NFL. Insiders say football has long defined Kelces identity, making the transition difficult. While opportunities await beyond the game, the uncertainty has created stress. Kelce has acknowledged the challenge publicly while evaluating his physical readiness and future.

title: Rabiot double lifts Milan after early scare at Como
description: Milan are second in the Serie A standings on 43 points, three behind rivals Inter Milan and three clear of Napoli in third, while Como are sixth with 34 points

title: How many deleted over citizenship from rolls: SC to EC
Senior Hamas figure killed in Israeli air strike in Gaza
description: Hamas accused Israel of violating the ceasefire deal in place since October 2025, and attempting to reignite the conflict

title: Venezuela leader 'not afraid' of 'diplomatic' US clash; wants 'respect' for Maduro
Brazilian Popeye bodybuilder Arlindo de Souza dies at 55 after kidney failure
description: Arlindo de Souza, known as the Brazilian Popeye, died at 55 in Recife after kidney failure and cardiac arrest, according to Globo. Famous for injecting oil into his arms, he later warned others about the dangers. His life was shaped by fame, health struggles, and personal loss, including the deaths of his brother and close friend.

title: Venezuela's Machado meets Trump, presents Nobel Peace Prize to him
description: We can count on President Trump, Machado told her supporters outside the White House

title: NHAI can nix Pune company's contract for Delhi-Mum e-way delay: HC
Iran's nationwide protests appear smothered after crackdown, internet outage
description: Iranian state media has announced wave after wave of arrests by authorities, targeting those it calls terrorists"

title: Greenland standoff: White House says European troops 'won't impact' Trump
Delonte West arrested for $23 robbery amid relapse struggles
description: Former NBA player Delonte West was arrested for the second time in two months in Virginia, facing charges of robbery and assault. The 42-year-old was apprehended after a victim reported being robbed and beaten, with less than $50 stolen. This arrest follows previous legal troubles and ongoing struggles with addiction and mental health.

title: WPL-4: UP Warriorz stuns Mumbai Indians to end losing streak
description: While Nat Sciver-Brunt claimed a couple of wickets, none of the other Mumbai Indians bowlers could make an impact

title: Hema Malini hits back at trolls over not smiling video
description: Hema Malini has given a sharp response to online criticism after a video of her from a sports event in Mathura sparked trolling over her expression. The veteran actress was criticised for appearing cold and not smiling while distributing medals. Now, she has addressed the backlash in her own understated way.

title: Vanessa & Kai Trump stun in red at Tiger Woods' luxury 50th charity gala
description: Kai Trump and her mother Vanessa Trump attended Tiger Woods 50th birthday party in Palm Beach, Florida. Kai shared photos on Instagram while supporting Woods charity, the TGR Foundation. Fans noticed Kais wrist bandage after recent surgery and Vanessas quiet presence beside Woods, showing their relationship remains strong as he continues his recovery.

title: News from the world of Education: January 16, 2026
description: Information on colleges, admissions, scholarships, events, MoUs, and more

title: India issues advisory for citizens in Israel in view of regional tensions
description: The U.S. and U.K. embassies also issued alerts for their citizens to avoid travel to the region

title: Iran unrest: White House says 800 executions 'halted' after Trump's warning
Patrick and Brittany Mahomes surprise Randi at 1587 Prime birthday bash
description: Randi Mahomes shared photos from her surprise birthday celebration during the NFL offseason, giving a glimpse into a warm family gathering. Patrick Mahomes and his wife Brittany were part of the event, which took place at his Kansas City restaurant, 1587 Prime. The celebration highlighted the close bond of the Mahomes family as Patrick continues his recovery.

title: Commitment to freedom: Venezuela opposition leader Machado meets Trump; 'presents' her Nobel prize
Govt offices attacked during SIR hearings in West Bengal
description: After attack on the BDO office at Farakka in Murshidabad district on Wednesday, thousands of locals vandalised BDO office at Chakulia in Uttar Dinajpur district

title: India Open 2026: Lakshya remains Indias lone hope
description: Title favourites and World No. 3 Chirag Shetty and Satwiksairaj Rankireddy were upset by the Japanese pair of Hiroki Midorikawa and Kyohei Yamashita

title: Omar Abdullah speaks to Jaishankar on J&K students stuck in Iran
10-year-old takes mothers body alone for autopsy after HIV death
description: A 10-year-old boy in Etah bravely brought his mother's body for a post-mortem alone after she succumbed to tuberculosis and HIV. Orphaned by the same disease the previous year, the child faced isolation until police intervened to arrange her final rites. Distant relatives eventually arrived, offering solace to the grieving boy.

title: J&K Police hand over suspected pigeon to wildlife department
India Open badminton: Bird poop halts match, adds to list of concerns
description: While the BAI has so far defended the conditions and the arrangements, Thursdays incident has further raised questions on the venues preparedness for the World Championships in August

title: J&K Police attach Pakistan-based terror handlers property in Poonch
Ja Morant ruled out vs Magic in Berlin: Calf injury update
description: Ja Morant will miss the Memphis Grizzlies' international game against the Orlando Magic in Berlin due to a right calf contusion. This marks his sixth consecutive absence, though he has traveled with the team and could return for a January 18th game in London. Memphis has struggled without him, holding a 6-12 record in games he's played this season.

title: Maharashtra civic polls: Young voters left confused over new alliances in Mumbai
description: Trends indicate the BJP has slowly increased its hold in the BMC, traditionally dominated by the Thackerays

title: Jim Leonhard rising as Cowboys' top defensive coordinator choice
description: The Dallas Cowboys are targeting Jim Leonhard as their next defensive coordinator, aiming to strengthen a below-average defense while Dak Prescott is in his prime. Leonhards rapid rise in college and the NFL, including a Broyles Award finalist nod and promotion under Sean Payton, makes him the standout candidate. Dallas is patiently waiting for him to become available.

title: Watch: U.S. seizes another Venezuela-linked oil tanker
WPL: Day after being retired out, Harleen Deol guides UP Warriorz to victory
description: Harleen Deol's unbeaten 64 guided UP Warriorz to their first WPL 2026 win, defeating defending champions Mumbai Indians by seven wickets. Deol's stellar performance anchored the chase after Mumbai's Nat Sciver-Brunt's 65 had earlier propelled them to 161 for five. UPW sealed the target with seven wickets in hand.

title: Bangladeshs interim government approves law to protect July warriors from prosecution
description: Law Adviser Asif Nazrul said the July revolutionists were indemnified for the acts they committed with an aim of political resistance during the uprising under the July Mass Uprising Protection and Accountability Ordinance

title: Punjab CM Mann appears before Akal Takht Secretariat to clarify remarks on Sikh traditions
description: Before appearing before the Takht Secretariat, where he was present for more than an hour, Mr. Mann offered prayers at the Golden Temple

title: India planning evacuation of nationals from Iran: Official sources
description: Iran had temporarily closed its airspace on January 14, but reopened it on January 15, which has increased the chances of India sending aircraft to Tehran

title: Defamation case filed against Khushi Mukherjee over Suryakumar claim
description: Social media influencer Faizan Ansari has filed a Rs 100 crore defamation case against actress Khushi Mukherjee on January 13, following her remarks about Indian T20I captain Suryakumar Yadav. The legal action comes after Mukherjee claimed in an earlier interview that Suryakumar used to message me a lot.

title: Tripura CM ready to accept Roman script for Kokborok language, Tipra Motha claims
description: Tipra Motha leaders said CM Manik Saha confirmed the State governments readiness to introduce the Roman script in all levels of examinations under the Tripura Board of Secondary Education (TBSE), CBSE and ICSE

title: Tense border: Drones spotted in Jammu sector; 3rd incident in 4 days
When 'Bazball' intent met conservatism: England's Ashes autopsy
description: Englands Ashes defeat in Australia was shaped as much by selection conservatism as on-field execution. Like India before them, they prioritised batting depth over wicket-taking firepower, rarely playing four frontline fast bowlers.

title: Cant we presume that voters who survived multiple roll revisions are citizens, Supreme Court poses petitioners query to ECI
description: The question from the CJI-led Bench came in the backdrop of discussions over a 1995 Supreme Court case law, which held that a person already enrolled in the voter list should not be asked to prove citizenship

title: A.R. Rahman says Hindi film industry has changed over past eight years: It could be a communal thing

title: Murder of democracy: Opposition claims irregularities in Maharashtra civic polls
description: Polling for 29 municipal corporations across Maharashtra on January 15 drew sharp political reactions, with Mumbais high-stakes BMC contest at the centre. Opposition parties alleged voting irregularities, including concerns over indelible ink, voter lists and polling procedures, while election authorities rejected the claims and said complaints were being examined.

title: US troops return to Qatar base, Iran reopens airspace: Trump's strike on Tehran called off?
description: US aircraft are returning to Qatar's Al Udeid base as security alerts are lowered, following President Trump's indication of easing Iran's protest crackdown. Iran reopened its airspace after a temporary closure due to fears of US military action. While tensions appear to have eased, the situation remains uncertain.

title: Japan FM Motegi, EAM Jaishankar to hold Strategic dialogue on Indo-Pacific, AI cooperation
description: Twin concerns over China and no Quad in sight to overshadow Japan India FM dialogue on Friday

title: U.S. seizes Venezuela-linked tanker ahead of Trump-Machado meeting
description: The seizure marks the sixth vessel targeted in recent weeks that was either carrying Venezuelan oil or had done so in the past. The officials, speaking on the condition of anonymity, said the seizure took place in the Caribbean

title: Maha triumph for BJP? Exit polls forecast Mahayuti sweep in BMC; Thackerays may stumble
description: Exit polls project a significant victory for the Mahayuti alliance in the BMC polls, with projections indicating they will surpass 130 seats. The Shiv Sena (UBT)MNS alliance is expected to secure just over 60 seats, falling short of expectations. The elections saw nearly 50% voter turnout across Mumbai and 28 other municipal corporations in Maharashtra.

title: Barabanki MP says Uttar Pradesh SIRs show rural voters exceed total number of voters in State; SC asks Election Commission to explain
description: After the Assembly SIR, the total number of voters in U.P. is shown as 12.56 crore, reflecting a reduction of about 2.89 crore voters. After the Panchayat SIR, the number of rural voters alone is shown as 12.69 crore, reflecting an increase of about 40 lakh voters, the note read

title: Watch: Tamil Nadus invisible cities: The urban growth nobody planned for | Focus Tamil Nadu
description: Urbanisation in Tamil Nadu is no longer limited to major cities like Chennai or Coimbatore. Rapid growth is happening in peri-urban areas that function like cities but are still classified as villages. These invisible urban zones drive growth yet face serious planning and governance challenges. In this episode, lets take a closer look at these overlooked edges of urban Tamil Nadu.

title: Odishas Sundargarh clash: Educational institutes shut on Jan. 16 as curbs imposed, internet suspended; at least 12 injured

Harvest Table, in association with The Hindu Lit For Life, raises funds for farmers while spotlighting seasonal, locally sourced ingredients.

title: Watch: The making of atchu vellam, an ingredient in sweet Pongal
description: Veeramangudi, in Papanasam taluk of Tamil Nadus Thanjavur district, is known for its production of the soft and crumbly atchu vellam (jaggery set into cubical wooden moulds). Factories in and around the village produce approximately 245 tonnes of jaggery (7,000 bags of 35 kg each) annually. Of late though, these factories have started closing down due to an attack of yellow leaf disease in the sugarcane crop.

description: Residents of Meivazhi Salai in Tamil Nadus Pudukkottai district came together to celebrate the Pongal festival with joy, tradition and community spirit on Thursday. From festive decorations to ritual cooking of Pongal, the harvest festival reflected gratitude, unity and cultural pride.

title: CBSE orders schools to disclose teacher strength: Why Indias comfortable PTR tells only half story
description: CBSE has told its affiliated schools to stop treating staffing as a backroom file. By February 15, 2026, they must put teacher details and qualifications on their websites under Mandatory Public Disclosure, with the board warning that gaps or errors can invite action under affiliation rules. The timing is telling: Indias PTR can look comfortable in national averages, but state-wise spikes and single-teacher schools reveal how unevenly teachers are actually spread.

title: Exports rise 1.87% to $38.5 billion in December: Commerce Secretary
description: Despite global uncertainties, India's exports are recording positive growth, Commerce Secretary Rajesh Agrawal says

title: Air India aircraft grounded after engine ingests cargo container; DGCA launches probe
description: The aircraft was operating a New DelhiNew York flight and returned to Delhi shortly after departure due to Iranian airspace restrictions

title: 'Stop coding': Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang to engineers; says this is what they should do instead
description: Nvidia's CEO Jensen Huang aims for engineers to code zero percent, leveraging AI assistants like Cursor to tackle complex, undiscovered problems. He believes this 'Purpose vs Task' approach, akin to radiology's evolution, will elevate human roles. While some, like Cursor's CEO, caution against unchecked AI development, Huang remains confident in this human-centric future for innovation.

title: Singer Saindhavi on music, films and life | Margazhi | GV Prakash
description:
Popular Chennai-based singer, Saindhavi, has just seen two radically different musical stages: Carnatic music performances at Chennais sabhas during the Margazhi season, and performing at actor Vijays Jana Nayagan musical event in Malaysia.

In an interview with The Hindu for the This Changed My Life video podcast, this popular singer talks about adapting to the needs of modern audiences. She also talks about her relationship with popular music composer GV Prakash after their official divorce in 2025, and how they co-parent their young daughter, Anvi.

Reporter: Srinivasa Ramanujam
Video: Johan Sathyadas, S Shiva Raj

description: Strategy (wise), I can't see anything that we've had to skirt around in terms of prepping for the (T20) World Cup. We are fully focused on this series. Every series is important, says India's assistant coach Ryan ten Doeschate

title: Quote of the day by Aristotle: 'The beauty of the soul shines out when a...'
description: Ancient philosopher Epictetus, once a slave, taught that true freedom lies in inner mastery, not external control. A quote, attributed to Aristotle, highlights that a noble spirit shines brightest when facing repeated hardship with composure, not by feeling nothing, but by rising above despair.

title: Zuckerberg hired Wang for $14B, now they're clashing: AI team in chaos; new boss moves in
description: Meta's new structure reveals tension between Mark Zuckerberg and Alexandr Wang, the $14 billion AI recruit. Wang finds Zuckerberg's micromanagement stifling, while staff question his leadership for Meta's AI ambitions. A recent strategy clash highlighted differing priorities, with Wang pushing for cutting-edge AI over immediate product integration.

title: LeBron James pens two-word message for Kyle Lowrys Toronto standing ovation
description: Toronto Raptors fans gave a heartfelt standing ovation to former star Kyle Lowry during his return, even as his 76ers team secured a win.  LeBron James lauded the touching sportsmanship with a social media post. Lowry, who spent nine years with the Raptors, called the moment a career highlight, cherishing the team's gesture.

title: Patrick Mahomes stays low-key as Brittany Mahomes marks milestone amid recovery doubts
description: Patrick Mahomes is staying largely out of the public eye as he continues his rehab following a season-ending knee injury. While his recovery timeline remains uncertain, his wife Brittany recently shared a family milestone, drawing attention to the quieter phase of Mahomes career as he balances healing, home life, and preparation for his return.
